reviewText: Chair Aerobics for Everyone is an excellent value for the money.  It provides a comprehensive set of exercises while avoiding the costs of expensive stage-craft.

I received this DVD and sfter it was loaded into the machine I tried to play it and it read on the tv screen that there was a disc error  I called the Wright Stuff Company and they said they would send me a new DVD. As of yet I have not received the DVD and that was about 2 weeks ago. Please help.
